description:
Hi

I've recently joined JLT in Bristol and in an effort to reignite the agile transformation of the development teams we have recruited Emma Hopkinson-Spark as an agile coach/scrum master.

In her first few weeks Emma has identified a lack of Product Ownership as the most significant challenge facing our development organisation. We're trying to build a large business application for multiple remote business owners often with conflicting priorities. We're nowhere near a solution but as it's a problem I've faced in previous roles I wondered whether it would be a possible topic for the October meet-up?

I've talked very briefly to Emma about this and she would be willing to put a presentation together on our situation and how we're looking to address these problems.

Let me know if this is of interest and we can try to put more material together.

Regards
Alex
title: Product Ownership at scale
